shared.proxy

Class Moxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.proxy.Moxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Proxy

    public class Moxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Proxy
    A Mock Proxy, or "Moxy", used primarily for unit testing when not connected to a server. Returns hardcoded results for the typical Proxy functions rather than connecting to a server.
    Author:
    Kent
